org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messages

Interface Message

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppBase.AsyncBladeRequest, AppBase.SyncBladeRequest, AsyncFacilityRequest, AsyncRequest, BladeBase.AsyncBladeRequest, BladeBase.SyncBladeRequest, IncDesImpl.AsyncBladeRequest, IncDesImpl.SyncBladeRequest, NewNotifierAReq, NewPropertiesNotifierAReq, NewPropertiesValidatorAReq, NewValidatorAReq, PropertiesTransactionAReq, PropertiesTransactionAReq, RequestBase, SubscribeAReq, SyncFacilityRequest, SyncPrinterRequest, SyncRequest, TransactionAReq, TransactionAReq

    public interface Message
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Message wraps the user/application AsyncRequest/Event which are queued in the Blade's targetReactor's inbox. The lightweight thread associated with the Blade's targetReactor will process the Message asynchronously.

    Both Event and AsyncRequest have private nested classes specific to their requirements.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eval()
      Execute the Event.processEvent or AsyncRequest.processAsyncRequest method of the event/request held by the message.
      boolean isForeign()
      Returns true when the response is to be sent to a targetReactor created with a different facility.
      boolean isIsolated()
      Returns true when the request is, directly or indirectly, from an IsolationReactor that awaits a response.
      boolean isResponsePending()
      Returns true when a response is expected but has not yet been placed in the message.
      void processException(Reactor _activeReactor, java.lang.Exception _e)
      Process the throwable on the current thread in the facility of the active targetReactor.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • isForeign

        boolean isForeign()
        Returns true when the response is to be sent to a targetReactor created with a different facility.
        Returns:
        True when the response is to be sent to a targetReactor created with a different facility.

      • isResponsePending

        boolean isResponsePending()
        Returns true when a response is expected but has not yet been placed in the message.
        Returns:
        True when a response is expected but has not yet been placed in the message.

      • isIsolated

        boolean isIsolated()
        Returns true when the request is, directly or indirectly, from an IsolationReactor that awaits a response.
        Returns:
        True whhe request is, directly or indirectly, from an IsolationReactor that awaits a response.

      • eval

        void eval()
        Execute the Event.processEvent or AsyncRequest.processAsyncRequest method of the event/request held by the message. This method is always called on the target targetReactor's own thread.

      • processException

        void processException(Reactor _activeReactor,
                    java.lang.Exception _e)
        Process the throwable on the current thread in the facility of the active targetReactor.
        Parameters:
        _activeReactor - The targetReactor providing the facility for processing the throwable.
        _e - The exception to be processed.
